00051 void lbann::target_layer_unsupervised::setup(int num_prev_neurons) {
00052 
00053   NumNeurons = m_input_layer->get_linearized_data_size(); //need inherittance
00054   Zeros(*Ds_Temp, NumNeurons, Layer::m_mini_batch_size);
00055 }
00056 
00058 DataType lbann::target_layer_unsupervised::forwardProp(DataType prev_WBL2NormSum) {
00059   input_mat = m_input_layer->get_local_mat();
00060   //Print(*input_mat);
00061   int num_errors = 0;
00062   //Layer::m_mini_batch_size or get input layer num_samples in batch
00063   target_layer::update_num_samples_processed(input_mat->Width());
00064   //std::cout << "Input " << input_mat->Width() << input_mat->Height() << std::endl;
00065   for (int mb_index= 0; mb_index < input_mat->Width(); mb_index++) { 
00066     DataType sum_errors=0.0;
00067     for (int f_index= 0; f_index < input_mat->Height(); f_index++) {
00068       //sumerrors += ((X[m][0] - XP[m][0]) * (X[m][0] - XP[m][0]));
00069       DataType x = input_mat->Get(f_index,mb_index);
00070       DataType x_bar = fp_input->GetLocal(f_index,mb_index);
00071       //num_errors += (x-x_bar) * (x-x_bar); //a good metric?
00072       sum_errors += (x-x_bar) * (x-x_bar);
00073     }
00074     num_errors = sum_errors;
00075   }
00076   num_errors = Layer::comm->model_allreduce(num_errors);
00077   return num_errors;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void lbann::target_layer_unsupervised::backProp() {
00082   input_circmat = m_input_layer->get_dist_mat();
00083   Copy(*input_circmat, *Ds_Temp);
00084 }

00087 execution_mode lbann::target_layer_unsupervised::get_execution_mode() {
00088   return m_execution_mode;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void lbann::target_layer_unsupervised::set_input_layer(input_layer_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io* input_layer) {
00092   m_input_layer = input_layer;
00093 }
